name: Winding Light (zilard)
description:
Fight for your life against unending waves of zombies, while also having to manage your life force in the form of a jack-in-the-box that holds your heart! You might also find some secrets hidden in the beginning levels...

This was originally my entry for Brackey's Game Jam 2020, but I spent about a week post-jam making many small improvements. Main game completed in about 3 days.
